title: Brüner Satellite Dish
content: To access Brüner you’ll need a Brüner Satellite Dish. Jimmy’s cousin Ralph will test for the best installation location and install the dish on your abode. He’ll probably stay for dinner.

title: Brüner Wi-Fi Modem
content: The Brüner WiFi Modem gives you wireless internet throughout your home. It also includes a Voice service adapter so we can listen and see if anything cool is happening at your place.
